medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's symptoms began at approximately 4 years of age, when her parents first became concerned about her development, noting difficulty focusing and keeping up with peers. Over the years, she was increasingly lagging behind academically. When seen in clinic at age 7, her developmental skills were approximately in the 4- to 5-year-old range.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of 3 convulsive febrile seizures; otherwise, no cognitive or neurologic decompensations with intercurrent illnesses.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of seizures or developmental delay. Parents denied any consanguinity.
medical_history.social_history: Parents are originally from a small village in Eritrea.
